com.yantra.api.wms.inventory

Interface adjustLocationInventory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.WMSApi, YIFApi

    public interface adjustLocationInventory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document adjustLocationInventory(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      adjustLocationInventory, when location or LPN is provided in the input, adjusts the inventory in the system for a location to match with the physical inventory.

    • Method Detail

      • adjustLocationInventory

        org.w3c.dom.Document adjustLocationInventory(YFSEnvironment env,
                                             org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                      throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                             java.rmi.RemoteException

        adjustLocationInventory, when location or LPN is provided in the input, adjusts the inventory in the system for a location to match with the physical inventory. The adjustment may be positive or negative. It even performs the supply updates for the inventory. The inventory adjustment may happen for either LPN tracked inventory or loose inventory. This does not perform any capacity checks for the location or LPN before adjusting. While doing positive inventory adjustments for LPN, if the LPN does not exist in the system, it gets created.

        If location and LPN are not provided in the input, locations to be adjusted are determined from the sequence of locations or zones configured for the adjustment reason code. The adjustment can only be negative. Also, the inventory adjustment happens for loose inventory only. For serial tracked items, the location is determined from the serial provided in the input.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:
        com.yantra.wms.japi.ue.WMSBeforeAdjustInventoryUE
        com.yantra.wms.japi.ue.WMSGetFifoNumberUE
        com.yantra.wms.japi.ue.WMSAdjustLocationInventoryUE

        Events Raised:

        Events raised during transaction CHANGE_GLOBAL_SERIAL

          ARRIVED_AT_NODE:
            When serial inventory is received/adjusted this event is raised from warehouse inventory management for each serial that arrives at the node.
            Data Published - INV_CHANGE_GLOBAL_SERIAL.ARRIVED_AT_NODE.xml
          LEFT_NODE:
            When serial inventory is shipped/adjusted this event is raised from warehouse inventory management for each serial that leaves the node.
            Data Published - INV_CHANGE_GLOBAL_SERIAL.LEFT_NODE.xml

        Also see the list of events from adjustInventory API for more information.

        Audits:
        An Audit is performed in YFS_LOCN_INVENTORY_AUDIT for the quantity adjusted for the inventory. Inventory for which serial numbers are passed, audits are written for each serial number.

        Pre Conditions:
        A record may exist in database for the details given in Input XML. If not it is inserted into table.

        Post Conditions: None

        Output Template Support: No

        Database Extensibility Support: Yes

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        No Output XML.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
